name: Disney Plus Subscription Auto-Cancellation
description: This automation pattern is designed to automatically cancel a Disney Plus subscription one week before its renewal date. This ensures the user does not get charged for an unwanted renewal. The process involves logging into the Disney Plus account, navigating to the subscription settings, and performing the cancellation through the provided digital interface.

banned_tools: Avoid using public RPA tools that may pose a security risk
required_integrations: Integrate with a notification system to confirm successful cancellation

llm_recommended_approach: Use Selenium to automate the browser tasks required to access and cancel the subscription. Schedule the script execution one week prior to the subscription renewal date using a cron job.
